alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:32PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pima County through 515 PM MST... At 432 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Miguel, or 18 miles south of Sells, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sells, Topawa, San Miguel, San Isidro, Ali Chukson, Gu Oidak, Vamori, Cowlic, Fresnal, Choulic, Newfield, Coldfields, No:ligk, Comobabi, Cababi, South Comobabi, San Luis - Sells District, Fresnal Canyon, Artesia and Rincon. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 104 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells
